name: Gramps Lost His Glasses
description:
Gramps has misplaced his glasses in the elder care centre! With his amazing time rewinding abilities, Gramps is able to turn back the clock and transform into his younger selves. With this ability, he can traverse through tricky areas and search for his misplaced glasses. However, don't let the caretakers see you in your younger forms or they will not recognise you and kick you out of the centre!

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 Theme: REWIND!
